title: SMRT Corporation
tweet: Seven North-South Line stations from Khatib to Novena will have shorter operational hours every weekend from 4 to 27 May. Shuttle bus services will be available between the stations. Plan your journey ahead and take other train lines and bus services. https://bit.ly/2vXmknd pic.twitter.com/lio72UjUv2

title: SMRT Corporation
tweet: To all our true SMRT heroes who work hard to serve our commuters and bring them better journeys, Happy Labour Day!pic.twitter.com/MKt9gsohpE

title: SMRT Corporation
tweet: Starting this week, #BukitPanjangLRT will close on every Sun from 15 Apr to 24 Jun to allow our team to have more time to carry out planned maintenance works. Shuttle bus svcs will be avail during the affected days. Pls plan ahead for your journey. https://bit.ly/2GLX60g pic.twitter.com/gEz7dbV0iH

title: SMRT Corporation
tweet: All 35 EWL stns from Tuas Link to Pasir Ris & from Tanah Merah to Changi Airport will have shorter operational hrs every weekend from 6 to 29 April. Shuttle bus svcs will be available between the stns. Plan ahead & take other train lines and bus svcs. https://bit.ly/2Gvq1Br pic.twitter.com/u47bY0op8M
